Always professional, SBS delivers accurate, effective, and reliable service. We will supply your business with personalized, expert, audit-proof financial statements, aimed at optimizing your business’s operation and performance.

Enable remote access to QuickBooks file and access to financial accounts.

Our trusted consultants will provide you with the advice and guidance services that you need in order to keep your business on the right track.

We believe in long term solutions - that’s why, in addition to the necessary financial resources, SBS extends your business potential by providing the tools necessary to maximize resources benefits in order to generate a stronger financial foundation.
SBS professionals will provide you with valuable and advantageous financial management tools so that you can enjoy an up to speed and stable business.
Simple. Easy. Error-free. SBS can take over your payroll responsibilities, relieving you of worries or difficulties. Enter the hours and leave the rest up to us.
So your business can improve and prosper, and since we believe that a satisfied customer is the best business strategy, we offer trustworthy low rates with prompt and professional support.

A customized business plan tailored to your business and accounting needs, suitable for any company structure and one of two available plans, designed for entrepreneurs and businesses seeking funds from investors or venture capitalists, or for companies desiring internal growth.
SBS helps you maintain maximum levels of cash flow by tracking sources and usage, predicting outcomes, and efficient fund distribution.

Especially suited for startup companies or companies looking to expand, this plan is ideal for Small Business Administration (SBA) loans, for funding of $50,000 to $1,000,000, internal documentation, and personal finances.
SBS installs, setups up, and trains you with today’s leading accounting software. Our QuickBooks Certified Professionals will ensure your company’s efficient use of QuickBooks.
We setup the accounting system for you, optimize cost containment, tax planning, investments, employee benefit and profit-sharing plans.
"If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance."
Just enter hours, we run payroll for you
Total pay and hours instantly calculated for you - so you can print check or use free direct dropsit. Error detection technology ensures accuracy.
We do payroll taxes and filing for you
We handle your payroll tax payments and forms for you. Guaranteed accurate and on-time. If a tax issue comes up, we'll resolve it for you.
Business Plan For Angel Investors And Venture Capitalists
Contact us for a free quote
Pay 50% on a secure website and both parties sign a non-disclosure service aggreement
You answer questions about your business and goals
A Writer, Researcher and Financial modeler build your business plan
Plan is complete and remaining 50% is due
You recieve the business plan in Word and Excel
You have 30 days to request FREE changes to the document
